posts.post_content:
Up for sale is a T206 Bill Shipke SGC 10 (poor) Piedmont 150 25 for $17 shipped and delivered.  Actually a decent card for a poor grade.  It has a crease from top to bottom and a few hairline creases on the side, and rounded corners, but no paper loss.

Paypal gift/owed for payment! 

Pm or email: [url]cavelyon@aol.com[/url]

Mike
